data.name: OrganizationDisplayName_InvalidName
data.value: The name is invalid

data.value: The data type of the value: '{0}' is unsupported

data.name: Setting_InvalidValueType
data.value: The value type of the value: '{0}' is unsupported

data.name: OrganizationRoot_Create_SharedRequiresPerson
data.value: Must be a person to create a 'Shared' organization

data.name: OrganizationRoot_UserNotOrgOwner
data.value: Must be an organization owner to perform this action

data.name: OrganizationRoot_UserNotServiceAccount
data.value: Must be a service account to perform this action

data.name: OrganizationRoot_UserNotMember
data.value: User must be a member of this organization

data.name: OrganizationRoot_InviteMember_UserIdAndEmailMissing
data.value: Both the ID of the user and an email for the user is missing

data.name: OrganizationRoot_NoAvatar
data.value: This organization has no avatar to delete

data.name: OrganizationRoot_InviteMember_PersonalOrgMembershipNotAllowed
data.value: Cannot add another user to a 'Personal' organization

data.name: OrganizationRoot_UnInviteMember_PersonalOrg
data.value: Cannot remove any members from a 'Personal' organization

data.name: OrganizationRoot_RoleNotAssignable
data.value: Role '{0}' is not assignable to a user

data.name: OrganizationRoot_DeleteOrganization_MembersStillExist
data.value: Cannot delete this organization while any others members still exist. They must be removed from the organization first

data.name: OrganizationRoot_NotBillingAdmin
data.value: Must be an billing administrator to perform this action

data.name: OrganizationRoot_CanTransferBillingSubscription_TransfereeNotBillingAdmin
data.value: Must be an billing administrator to have the subscription transferred

data.name: OrganizationRoot_UserNotBillingSubscriber
data.value: Must be the subscriber of the billing subscription to perform this action

data.name: OrganizationRoot_UninviteMember_BillingSubscriber
data.value: Cannot remove the subscriber of the billing subscription from the organization

data.name: OrganizationRoot_NotBillingSubscriberNorBillingAdmin
data.value: Must be the owner of the billing subscription or be an billing administrator to perform this action

data.name: OrganizationRoot_DeleteOrganization_BillingSubscriptionCannotBeUnsubscribed
data.value: Cannot delete this organization as the billing subscription cannot be terminated in its current state

data.name: OrganizationRoot_NoSubscriber
data.value: This organization has no billing subscriber
